metadata.title: CVE-2022-25882 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Versions of the package onnx before 1.13.0 are vulnerable to DirectoryTraversal as the external_data field of the tensor proto can have a path tothe file which is outside the model current directory or user-provideddirectory, for example "../../../etc/passwd"

criterions.comment: onnx package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
